name: Last Survivors
description:
The game allows you to experience an incredibly satisfying shooting experience, immersing yourself in the joy of shooting zombies. However, be careful not to harm humans in the zombie horde.
Show off your shooting skills, survive in extreme situations, and become the last survivor in the post-apocalyptic world!
The game offers as many as dozens of different firearm fusions and upgrades, allowing you to achieve personalized weapon strikes.
If you feel powerful enough, challenge mode may provide a higher level of difficulty for a more exciting combat experience.
